name: Collect the Balls
description:
Select the game mode and player color, and collect as many balls as you can within the time limit!

Red balls are 1 point each
Blue ones are 5 points each
Be warned, it speeds up as each one is collected!

P1 movement: WASD
P2 movement: arrow keys

Made with the PixelGameEngine, by Javidx9 over on YouTube. With help from Sigonasr2 on Javidx9's One Lone Coder Discord server.
